The claim is based on a Facebook post th: their COVID-19 risk levels, and designated lockdown measures.
The Philippine government: s guidelines divide areas into categories of low, moderate, and high COVID-19 risks, with corresponding quarantine measures.
The claim alleges that the Inter: Agency Task Force on Emerging Infectious Disease (IATF) has put Metro Manila, Cebu, and Laguna back under enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) following lockdown easing in mid-May.
